column1: Widow Rumble was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Widow Rumble looked after Gaffer Gamgee after the War of the Ring when his son Samwise Gamgee moved from Bagshot Row to Bag End.
J.R.R. Tolkien mentions that "rumble" is not a meaningful word in the Hobbitish of that era.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
